selection.desc: Number of fingers = number of words (Index + middle = two words)
Index + thumb, start with a pinch then part them to start selecting
Both indices, start with slightly close together, then part them to start selecting
Raise the right hand with five fingers separated to indicate the start of the selection, then use and move the right index to select
Double tap with the right index, then move it to the right to select
Make one tap with the right index to idicate the start of the selection, move and slide to select, then move up to end selection
Pinch and expand, slide the hand to select
One tap with the right index to start the section, then move and slide to start selection, then double tap to stop selecting

gestures.desc: Swipe the right hand towards the bottom left (down)
Press the backspace key on the keyboard
Point and move the right index down
Point and move the right index up
Double tap with middle and index fingers
Pinch and move the hand up to through away
Strikethrough text with the right index
